channel.title: available on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in available on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-16
item.description: Samsung’s Galaxy A33 leaks in full before its ‘Awesome’ launch (3 minute read) Samsung is set to announce three devices at its Awesome Galaxy A Event this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: Microsoft releases DirectStorage: ‘a new era of fast load times and detailed worlds in PC games’ (3 minute read) Microsoft’s DirectStorage API has arrived for Windows.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-10
item.description: Twitter is launching a Tor service for more secure and private tweeting (3 minute read) Twitter has launched a Tor version of its site.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-04
item.description: Netflix is launching a daily trivia series called Trivia Quest (2 minute read) Netflix’s new interactive series Trivia Quest will launch on April 1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-31
item.description: Tesla launches ‘TeslaMic,’ a microphone for in-car karaoke (2 minute read) Tesla has launched a microphone designed for its in-car karaoke system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-17
item.description: Meta’s sci-fi haptic glove prototype lets you feel VR objects using air pockets (6 minute read) Meta has revealed a pair of haptic gloves that lets people feel objects in virtual reality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-08
item.description: Cruise lays out its plan for ‘how’ it will make robotaxis a reality (7 minute read) GM’s self-driving subsidiary Cruise recently presented a roadmap for how the company will build autonomous vehicles that will be safer and more scalable than any human-driven vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-19
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced: New AirPods, MacBook Pros, colorful HomePod Minis and more (8 minute read) Apple has announced new MacBook Pro laptops with M1 Pro and M1 Max chips, an HDMI port, an SD card slot, a MagSafe connector, a notch cutout on the top of the screen, and 3 USB-C ports.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-24
item.description: Nintendo Switch Online is getting an ‘expansion pack’ with N64 and Genesis games (1 minute read) The Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack will let Nintendo Switch Online members play Nintendo 64 and Sega Genesis games.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-27
item.description: Snapchat’s new AR features can identify the world around you (5 minute read) Scan is a new feature from Snapchat that can identify a range of objects.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-07
item.description: Amazon shifts Lumberyard to open source 3D game engine supported by 20 companies (13 minute read) Amazon has open-sourced its Lumberyard game engine and renamed it the Open 3D Engine.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-06
item.description: Andy Jassy officially takes over as Amazon CEO from Jeff Bezos (3 minute read) Jeff Bezos has stepped down as CEO of Amazon and is now the Executive Chair.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-21
item.description: Google working on ‘Spot’ app and ‘Find My Device network’ (3 minute read) Google is working on a new capability for its Find My Device network called Spot.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-14
item.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX inks satellite connectivity deal with Google Cloud (3 minute read) Google has signed a deal with SpaceX to use Starlink with its cloud unit.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-10
item.description: Elon Musk’s SpaceX is literally launching a Dogecoin-funded satellite to the Moon (2 minute read) SpaceX is now accepting Dogecoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-20
item.description: Microsoft’s ‘Netflix-for-gaming’ service launches on iPhone and PC this week (2 minute read) Microsoft’s Xbox Cloud Gaming service will roll out in beta on iOS and PCs this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-23
item.description: Apple’s HomePod mini reportedly has a secret temperature and humidity sensor (2 minute read) Apple’s HomePod mini smart speaker has a secret temperature and humidity sensor in its casing.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-08
item.description: We should be teleporting, not transporting: Mark Zuckerberg; Hints Facebook Labs working on it in Clubhouse chat show (3 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg detailed Facebook’s progress in virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) in a Clubhouse meeting recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-03
item.description: Apple announces November 10 One More Thing event for ARM-based Macs (3 minute read) Apple has announced a third fall media event as expected.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-28
item.description: SpaceX Starlink public beta begins (2 minute read) SpaceX has started to send email invitations to Starlink’s public beta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-01
item.description: Google announces the Pixel 5 for $699 (3 minute read) The Google Pixel 5 will be available in eight countries on October 15th, then in the US on October 29th for $699.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-25
item.description: Amazon announces new cloud gaming service called Luna (3 minute read) Amazon has announced a new cloud gaming platform called Luna.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-10
item.description: Spotify are reportedly working on a new karaoke feature (1 minute read) Spotify is working on a Karaoke Mode that will feature lyrics and adjustable vocal levels for songs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-01
item.description: Amazon’s Prime Air can officially begin drone delivery trials in the US (2 minute read) Amazon has officially become an air carrier, with the Federal Aviation Administration granting Amazon Prime Air approval to begin its first commercial delivery trials in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-13
item.description: The Surface Duo, Microsoft’s first-ever Android phone, is $1,400 (6 minute read) The Surface Duo is now available for pre-order and will ship on September 10.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-06
item.description: Samsung announces the Galaxy Z Fold 2 with bigger screens and better cameras (2 minute read) The new Galaxy Z fold 2 handset was officially announced at Samsung’s Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-30
item.description: Everything you need to know from the tech antitrust hearing (10 minute read) Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, Tim Cook, and Sundar Pichai recently testified in Congress that their business practices don’t amount to anti-competitive monopolies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-14
item.description: Google just put a photo of the Pixel 4A on its store (1 minute read) An image of Google’s Pixel 4A was mistakenly published on its Canadian store.
